name: planted.steak
description: A refined steak variant with a spicy paprika marinade, sliced thinner for quick cooking.
longDescription: Our planted.steak Paprika takes the steak experience to new heights with a bold, spicy marinade. Sliced thinner than our classic version for faster cooking, it maintains that juicy, tender texture while delivering a kick of paprika flavor. Perfect for those who like a little heat with their protein.
ingredients: Water, soy protein, rapeseed oil, paprika, natural flavoring, spices, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 2 minutes on each side until heated through. The thinner cut means faster cooking - perfect for busy weeknights.
